text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Amphibious. Low Profile on ground. Allows non-underground plants to be planted on water.

$(br2)$(#bd951a)Lily Pad never complains. Lily Pad never wants to know what's going on. Put a Plant on top of Lily Pad, they won't say a thing. Do they have startling opinions or shocking secrets? Nobody knows.

pages.title: 🧪 Aquatics
pages.text: $(#25228d)Lets you Plant non-Aquatics Plants on water.
